original_text: Then Elijah went into the desert by himself. He travelled for about a day. He found a small tree there and he sat down under it. He prayed that he might die. He said, ‘ Lord, I have had enough trouble! Take my life from me. It is no better for me here than to be with my dead ancestors.’
korean_text: 자기 자신은 광야로 들어가 하룻길쯤 가서 한 로뎀 나무 아래에 앉아서 자기가 죽기를 원하여 이르되 여호와여 넉넉하오니 지금 내 생명을 거두시옵소서 나는 내 조상들보다 낫지 못하니이다 하고

sentences.original_text: Then Elijah went into the desert by himself
He travelled for about a day
He found a small tree there
and he sat down under it
He prayed that he might die
He said, 'Lord, I have had enough trouble!'
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 말했습니다, '주님, 저는 충분한 고통을 겪었습니다!'

sentences.original_text: It is no better for me here
than to be with my dead ancestors
